content: KCCM-MD L Kwik Cast Connect (multi-thread) cast-in-place anchor Ultimate-performance long plate push-to-connect, cast-in-place anchor with multi-thread for concrete on metal deck with approvals ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Cast-in anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Optimized for productivity – quick push-to-connect system offers faster installation speed compared with internally threaded cast-in anchors Less time on deck – small drilling diameter and pre-assembled spanner plate and self-tapping screws help reduce installation time 2-in-1 connection – multi-thread configuration offers two rod diameter options in one anchoring point Less re-work – color-coded plastic plugs help protect inner threads from concrete and Monokote® fireproofing Compatible accessories – combine with KCM-MD Combo Bit, 2-in-1 step bit and nut setter for quick and easy installation Applications Ideal for pre-assembled / pre-fabricated hanger assemblies Pre-installed fastening points for suspending pipes, electrical conduits, cable trays, HVAC ducts and equipment, medical equipment and other overhead elements ### TECHNICAL DATA: Material, corrosion: Carbon steel, zinc-plated Anchor type: Single-point, Cast-in Head configuration: Internally threaded Technical Data | Material, corrosion | Carbon steel, zinc-plated | Anchor type | Single-point, Cast-in | Head configuration | Internally threaded | Material composition | Carbon steel, Polypropylene | PROFIS Software | Yes ### ITEMS- 2363086 - Kwik cast KCCM-MD L 1/4,3/8 GRN-PNK - Package Size 25 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCCM MD-L Small Cast-in anchor assy - 2363089 - Kwik cast KCCM-MD L 3/8,1/2 ORG-YEL - Package Size 20 pc Package Contents: - 1x KCCM MD-L Medium Cast-in anchor assy - 3950141 - KCCM-MD L 3/8,1/2 ORG-YEL PALLET + 2KCM-MD-CB - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x Combo Bit KCM-MD-CB 3/16-7/8 - 540x KCCM MD-L Medium Cast-in anchor assy - 3950140 - KCCM-MD L 3/8,1/2 ORG-YELPALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 540x KCCM MD-L Medium Cast-in anchor assy - 3950135 - KCCM-MD L 1/4,3/8 GRN-PNK PALLET + 3KCM-MD-CB - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 3x Combo Bit KCM-MD-CB 3/16-7/8 - 675x KCCM MD-L Small Cast-in anchor assy - 3950134 - KCCM-MD L 1/4,3/8 GRN-PNK PALLET - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 675x KCCM MD-L Small Cast-in anchor assy
